text:
I want to use
technology to shrink

the gap between the
haves and the have-nots.

I want to build things
that create opportunities

for kids who were just not
born to the right family.

I want to make the
world a place where

everyone has an equal chance
no matter where they came from.

My vision is to be
part of building

a world for my daughter, in
which merit and hard work

are the currency with
which to advance.

I want to create education
opportunities in tech

for people who would
have never considered

There's a saying in the Jewish
faith, "He who saves one life,

So, for me, changing
the entire world
